name: Cirno Catch Frog
description:
→ WebGL only supports Chromium-based browsers due to a Godot 4 and itch.io compatibility issue. Consider downloading the standalone version for the best experience. Controls

[Gameplay]

Left Mouse Button (Hold): Focus Magic Circle

Right Mouse Button (Click): Freeze the Frog!

Cursor: Aim

[System and Debug]
F2: Toggle FPS Counter
Alt + Enter: Toggle Fullscreen

Credits

edisonlee55 | https://edisonlee55.itch.io

a24203740 | https://a24203740.itch.io

C4 | @C4_create

This is a Touhou Fan Game Project. Submitted to Touhou Fan Game Jam 10.
